html:
(6) We are all as an unclean thing . . .—Better, as he who is unclean, scil., like the leper ofLeviticus 13:45 .

Filthy rags point to that which to the Israelite was the other extremest form of ceremonial uncleanness, as inEzekiel 36:17 .

Have taken us away—scil., afar off from the light and favour of Jehovah.
